title: Drift into Sleep (Featuring: Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast)
description:
Welcome back, sleepyheads. This is a bonus episode that features a mix of gentle rain and relaxing music from the Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast. For more tranquilizing audio to help you sleep, subscribe to the Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast today:
 - Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/deep-sleep-sounds/id1512016028.  
 -  Spotify:  https://open.spotify.com/show/08OoufgDXbghIZdJsM5dtm?si=dYteHdSaREib7-qI5PDtOw.   
 -  Google Podcasts:  https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbmNob3IuZm0vcy8xYmNjNmNiMC9wb2RjYXN0L3Jzcw.
 
That’s all for now. We'll be back with another great bedtime story tomorrow night. Sweet dreams ❤️ 😴
itunes:title: Drift into Sleep (Featuring: Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast)
itunes:author: Slumber Studios
itunes:subtitle: A special bonus music-only episode from our sister podcast Deep Sleep Sounds. A mix of relaxing music and gentle rain will guide you into a restorative sleep.

content:encoded:
Welcome back, sleepyheads. This is a bonus episode that features a mix of gentle rain and relaxing music from the Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast. For more tranquilizing audio to help you sleep, subscribe to the Deep Sleep Sounds Podcast today:

 - Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/deep-sleep-sounds/id1512016028.  

 -  Spotify:  https://open.spotify.com/show/08OoufgDXbghIZdJsM5dtm?si=dYteHdSaREib7-qI5PDtOw.   

 -  Google Podcasts:  https://podcasts.google.com/feed/aHR0cHM6Ly9hbmNob3IuZm0vcy8xYmNjNmNiMC9wb2RjYXN0L3Jzcw.

 

That’s all for now. We'll be back with another great bedtime story tomorrow night. Sweet dreams ❤️ 😴
